title: Ep. 376 - America Is Great, But The NYT Is Not
description:
The NYT publishes a 5-minute long “video essay” titled “Please Stop Telling Me America Is Great” just in time for the Fourth of July. Then, Sargon of Akkad stops by to talk YouTube and politics. Finally, the Mailbag, and my favorite soldier story from the Revolutionary War! Date: 07-03-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
